name: Ridealong Cocktail
description: A brighter, livelier version of a classic Sidecar that swaps in grapefruit liqueur and ups the Cognac just a bit.
recipeIngredient: One 3- to 4-​inch grapefruit peel, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients except grapefruit peel in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously, then double-​strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with grapefruit peel, spritzed skin side down over the surface of the drink before being added to the cocktail.
